title: Kai'sa is going to be nerfed.
body:
I'll put $10 on it.

She'll be nerfed next patch.

replies.body: Jokes on you shes fucking garbage

> [{quoted}](name=LetsTwitch,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cdF5VMil,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-03-09T10:31:11.872+0000)
>
> Jokes on you shes fucking garbage

So was Zoe.

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cdF5VMil,comment-id=00050000,timestamp=2018-03-09T11:25:16.268+0000)
>
> So was Zoe.

Zoe doesnt have fundamental problems with her kit

Lmao, every champ gets released OP to boost sales, then subsequently gets nerfed, you must be new.

Every rework that has new skins to go with it, will be OP to boost sales, then get nerfed.

It has been this way for years, even before Tencent took over.

[edit] I'd take that bet though... it won't be next patch, it'll be a few weeks down the line, once sales drop off.

> [{quoted}](name=QAPLA,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cdF5VMil,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2018-03-08T23:55:51.985+0000)
>
> Lmao, every champ gets released OP to boost sales, then subsequently gets nerfed, you must be new.
> 
> Every rework that has new skins to go with it, will be OP to boost sales, then get nerfed.
> 
> It has been this way for years, even before Tencent took over.
> 
> [edit] I'd take that bet though... it won't be next patch, it'll be a few weeks down the line, once sales drop off.

Calling me new is crazy seeing as I've been here since the closed beta, but whatever helps you sleep at night.
The pattern of rito releases has tended to be release an op champ, get people on the hype train to get to know the champ and buy a skin or two, then wind the power back a bit a few months later.
Man do u have nothing better to do than make a new complaint on the boards every few days

> [{quoted}](name=LAKIGR,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cdF5VMil,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-03-08T11:29:10.405+0000)
>
> Man do u have nothing better to do than make a new complaint on the boards every few days

omae wa mou shindeiru

> [{quoted}](name=Broken Scripts,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=cdF5VMil,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2018-03-08T12:34:57.037+0000)
>
> omae wa mou shindeiru

Not entirely sure why uve used that as your reply

She's actually really well designed with clear strength and weakness.

Her numbers might be a little high, but it's too early to know, we'll need at least two weeks of her on live to know how good she really is.
